Articles.Content:
You're so creative.

Fact: Cellular phones will not give you cancer. Only hepatitis.

Better install a good antivirus.

Fun fact: Over 90% of things people buy are either in a mountain of landfill or in the ocean within 6 months of being bought.

Didn't know that.

Fact: There's a city in Brazil called "Ceres".

Cere-essly?

Fun fact: Nothing can ultimately be proven a fact, no matter how much it makes sense. This is because of anatomical limitations.
East St. Louis, Illinois, has a higher murder rate then Honduras, the country with the highest murder rate

Screw logic.

Fact: In Greek myth, the craftsman Daedalus invented human flight so a group of Minotaurs would stop teasing him about it.

Oh yeah, I read about that once.

Fun fact: 4 of the people running for president in 2016 (can't remember who, but I think bush and Clinton were among them) believe guns should have a right to vote.

Really? That's messed up, lol

Fact: Every square inch of the human body has 32 million bacteria on it.

Depends on the time of day

Fact: Many so called 'fun facts' in this topic are neither fun nor fact.

Kind of...

fun fact: Goldfish have no stomach.

Like, when they eat the food just comes out behind instantly?

Fact: The occupation of court jester was invented accidentally, when a vassal's epilepsy was mistaken for capering.

Fact: Specialists focus a few things and are real good at them, generalists dislike to focus singles things and prefer to deal with the basis of many things

Fun: Generalists often help specialists to talk with each others becauses they often are too proud of themselve and there focus pole and related beliefs to put there noises away of there own sheets to watch others sheets.

'sigh'

Gimme gimme gimme IQ after midnight

Won't somebody help me chase the shadows away

Gimme gimme gimme IQ after midnight

Take me through the darkness to the break of the day

'sigh'

Fun Fact: This thread was originally only meant for interesting true facts.
Fun Fact: It would take 120 hummingbirds each flapping their wings for 24 hours to equal the count of Twitter tweets in a day.

The fact: the decimal and hex value of the binary number 0111 is 7.

The fun fact: the hex value of the binary number 01110111 is 77.

I know this because last night, after doing a few missions in KSP, my number of Kash units was 01110111. And I said to myself: "huh, self, in the morning when I'm doing nothing at work I'm gonna look up if 01110111 means anything in binary".

Cool story.

Fun fact: 2 is the only number where n + n, n x n and n^n all have the same answer.
